sqlMap.select: SELECT U.USER_EMAIL , C.CONTENT_ID , C.TITLE , C.CRT_TIME , C.CONTENT_TYPE , C.VIEW_COUNT FROM TN_WATCH W, TN_CONTENT C, TN_USER_INFO U WHERE C.CONTENT_ID = W.CONTENT_ID AND U.USER_IDX = W.USER_IDX AND W.USER_IDX = #userIdx# ORDER BY W.CRT_TIME DESC
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TN_WATCH ( USER_IDX, CONTENT_ID ) VALUES ( #userIdx# , #contentId# )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM TN_WATCH WHERE CONTENT_ID = #contentId# AND USER_IDX = #userIdx#
